entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 at times late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
